target-enhancements.enable-target-modifi: Allows user to hold down the 't' key when clicking to target tokens ** EXPERIMENTAL **
target-enhancements.use-player-color-nam: Use player color for target indicator
target-enhancements.use-player-color-hin: Use player color for target indicator
target-enhancements.target-indicator-hin: Select the indicator for a targeted token
target-enhancements.enable-ctrl-resize-m: While holding <SHIFT>, user can resize the token using the mousewheel. The token MUST NOT BE SELECTED!
target-enhancements.enable-target-portra: Shows player avatar/npc tokens on targets. Disabling turns on the colored baubles.
target-enhancements.friendly-color-hint: Border color of friendly enemies when you hold ALT or mouseover their tokens
target-enhancements.neutral-color-hint: Border color of neutral enemies when you hold ALT or mouseover their tokens
target-enhancements.hostile-color-hint: Border color of hostile enemies when you hold ALT or mouseover their tokens
target-enhancements.enable-colorblind-fe: Enables a set of features to help those who are colorblind
target-enhancements.ReleaseBehaviourHint: This setting determines how easy target behaves when clicking multiple tokens. 'Sticky' mode will target each clicked token without un-targeting anything, and you must click a token again to un-target it. 'Standard' mode more closely matches the standard foundry behaviour where all previous tokens are automatically un-targeted when clicking a new token, and you must hold Shift while clicking in order to target multiple tokens.
target-enhancements.display-notificaton-: Display notification: Write on chat enabled (Need some developing)
Display notification: Write on chat enabled (Need some developing)
Display notification: Write on chat but Hide name of npc/monster with 'Unknown Creature' label
Display notification: Write on chat but Hide name of npc/monster with 'Unknown Creature' label
Display notification: Write on chat but show only to GM
Display notification: Write on chat but show only to GM
Display notification: Write on chat to players but only when a player is targetting
Display notification: Write on chat to players but only when a player is targetting
